result.reason: Maintainer comments confirm mass-edit/multi-select organization is wanted and the request is actionable without extra information.
result.approach: Update connection-tree organize actions to operate on all selected nodes (`SelectedObjects`) for drag/drop and context-menu commands, then add multi-selection regression tests.
